attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This is one of the worst apps I have ever gotten. The first thing I see when I open it is a racist and homophobic Cheeto puff 🤢. It was probably the most horrifying thing I’ve ever seen.DO NOT get this app it starts to glitch then the next thing you know there is a cow in my kitchen. Please do not vote for someone who’s brain is the size of a peanut

attributes.title: eww
attributes.review: Overall terrible quality not worth getting has no actual purpose and is not helpful at all nor does it have any benofit to anyway -10101/10 I would NOT recommend getting.

attributes.title: App is no good
attributes.review: Yes I do support black lives matter but I do have to support my own president so when I heard about the app I decided to check it out to see the news and what is happening in the trump community. And for first few days I thought the app was pretty good but a week later it started going haywire and it would close the app right when I entered it not to mention my phone was really really slow and the took large amounts of storage on my iPhone 6. And I know you might be thinking it’s just that my phone is super old or that I just have a bunch of apps but I only have my social media platforms and apps like YouTube and stuff like that and my phone has never ever done those things. I have really good WiFi and it’s connected to my hotspot so it shouldn’t be acting like those so I do not recommend this app it’s a scam and it’s not worth breaking you’re phone I wish I could give it a 0 but unfortunately I can’t I really don’t recommend.

attributes.title: Why I hate Donald Trump
attributes.review: Let me tell you something about Donald Trump he is the worst president out of all the presidents that we had he is racist even though he says he’s not. Even my little brother of two years old things that Donald Trump is the worst.But I think about Donald Trump 2020 is that he is completely worthless. That’s why Brocco Bahma will be a better president and always will be a better president than Donald Trump. This is why celebrities all around the world are not voting Donald Trump because they’re trying to support their culture and I’m trying to support mine. So just wanted to say I hate you Donald Trump and keep supporting Black Lives Matter Hispanic lives matter and all the other racist.

attributes.title: App is terribly put together and will not download again
attributes.review: Hi, I hardly ever write reviews but I felt for this app I had to. This app is so hard to use and is terribly put together. I downloaded this app to see what was all the hype about Donald Trump and maybe even attend one of his “Kinda” racist rallies. But I can now see why there is so many one star ratings. It’s annoying to use and if you turn on, the notifications, you'll get constant notifications saying things like “The dems(ocrats) don’t want president Trump to win” “The dems hate supporters like you.” And “The dems hate president Trump because they wish they could f*ck trump like he’s f**cked the United States. It so negative!! Why can’t we all get along?!?! All political choices matter!!! I don’t think this app is even child friendly! These constant messages are so annoying to the point that it’s waking up my wife, my wife’s husband, my wife’s wife, Me, our 12 year, their 11 year old, our 8 year, our 7 twins, their 5 year old, our 3 year old, my grandmother, their grandfather (May he Rest In Peace), our dog, my cat and little Tim Tim (who’s only 7 months old). I will be deleting this app, just for mine and my family’s mental health.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Why does his face have to be all over the screen as well as the amount of just pathetic color on the backgrounds.This app couldn’t get any worse than it is.I was really looking forward to read and maybe even listing some political issues and points he made but sadly nothing but racism came up🥰🥳🤡
Oop- I gave a bad review— also I heard someone put the whole bee movie script in the reviews, so I’m trying find that lmao—

attributes.title: bunker baby don’t need an app
attributes.review: send this message to 10 or more people or you will be cursed with bad luck and a crazy man will take over the world

attributes.title: you like jazz? 🤡🤡🥰🤠✨👁👄👁🙇🏻‍♀️😻😡😌
attributes.review:
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

  
Barry, I told you,
stop flying in the house!

  
- Hey, Adam.
- Hey, Barry.

  
- Is that fuzz gel?
- A little. Special day, graduation.

  
Never thought I'd make it.

  
Three days grade school,
three days high school.

  
Those were awkward.

  
Three days college. I'm glad I took
a day and hitchhiked around the hive.
You did come back different.- Hi, Barry.
- Artie, growing a mustache? Looks good. 
- Hear about Frankie?
- Yeah.  
- You going to the funeral?
- No, I'm not going.Everybody knows,
sting someone, you die. 
Don't waste it on a squirrel.
Such a hothead.  
I guess he could have
just gotten out of the way.I love this incorporating
an amusement park into our day.That's why we don't need vacations.  
Boy, quite a bit of pomp...
under the circumstances.- Well, Adam, today we are men.
- We are! 
- Bee-men.
- Amen!  
Hallelujah!  
Students, faculty, distinguished bees 
please welcome Dean Buzzwell.Welcome, New Hive Oity
graduating class of... 
...9:15. 
That concludes our ceremonies.  
And begins your career
at Honex Industries!Will we pick ourjob today?  I heard it's just orientation. 
period 🧚🏼✨😌🤡🥰😡🤠😻🤪🥵😳👁👅👁

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: The app literally got into MY iCloud.THEN the app deleted all my photos!!!WORST APP EVER! I WANTED TO SEE THE LATEST ON TRUMP AND IT HACKED ME!! NOW I HAVE A NEW ICLOUD AND LOST EVERYTHING!!!!
